This app is a lifesaver! My dog ate something questionable and your app confirmed it was safe. Thank you!
name: Rahul Sharma

text: Great concept but needs more food options for exotic pets.
name: Priya Patel
reply: Thanks for the suggestion! We're working on expanding our database.

text: The UI could be more intuitive. Had trouble finding the search function.
name: Amit Singh

text: My cat is allergic to many foods. This app helps me avoid dangerous items. 5 stars!
name: Neha Gupta

text: Does this app work for birds? I have a parrot.
name: Vikram Joshi
reply: Yes! We cover most common pet birds including parrots.

text: The camera scanning feature is brilliant! Saves so much time.
name: Ananya Reddy

text: Would love to see a dark mode option in future updates.
name: Arjun Kapoor

text: App crashes sometimes when scanning barcodes. Please fix.
name: Meera Desai
reply: We're aware of this issue and working on a fix for the next update.

text: This should be mandatory for all pet owners! So helpful.
name: Rohan Malhotra

text: The subscription price is a bit high for the features offered.
name: Kavita Nair

text: My vet recommended this app and I'm so glad they did!
name: Aditya Verma

text: Could you add a feature to track my pet's meals and reactions?
name: Shreya Iyer
reply: Great suggestion! We're planning to add this in version 2.0.

text: The database seems limited for raw food diets.
name: Vivek Choudhary
reply: Thanks for pointing out I'll take a look‚ù§Ô∏è

text: I love the daily pet care tips! Very informative.
name: Divya Menon

text: App takes too long to load on my older phone.
name: Rajeev Srinivasan
reply: We're working on performance optimizations for older devices.

text: The community forum is very active and helpful.
name: Anjali Bhat

text: Would be great to have multilingual support.
name: Suresh Kumar

text: My rabbit's health has improved since using this app to check his food!
name: Pooja Mehta

text: The emergency contact feature saved my cat's life last week!
name: Alok Gupta

text: Too many ads in the free version. Makes it hard to use.
name: Nisha Rao

text: The pet first aid guide is comprehensive and easy to follow.
name: Manoj Bajpai

text: Could you add more information about portion sizes?
name: Deepika Sharma

text: I use this app every time I go grocery shopping for my dog!
name: Ravi Teja

text: The update made the app much faster. Good job!
name: Swati Nair

text: Wish there was a way to sync data between multiple devices.
name: Karan Malhotra
reply: This feature is coming in our next update!

text: The breed-specific recommendations are very accurate.
name: Anita Deshpande

text: My ferret loves the treats your app recommended!
name: Vishal Yadav

text: The app doesn't recognize some international pet food brands.
name: Ayesha Khan
reply: We're expanding our international database. Please check back soon!

text: The nutrition calculator is my favorite feature!
name: Prakash Jain

text: Would love to see more holistic/natural food options.
name: Radhika Agarwal

text: The app helped me identify an allergy in my cat. Thank you!
name: Siddharth Bose

text: The subscription auto-renewed without warning. Not cool.
name: Preeti Chawla
reply: We apologize for this. You can turn off auto-renew in your account settings.

text: The new UI redesign is much cleaner and easier to use.
name: Harish Patel

text: My vet was impressed with the app's accuracy!
name: Neha Kapoor

text: The recall alerts have saved me twice now from bad pet food.
name: Rajat Sharma

text: Could you add a feature to share food lists with pet sitters?
name: Anjali Gupta

text: The app sometimes gives conflicting information with my vet's advice.
name: Vikram Singh
reply: Please always consult your vet for medical advice. Our app is for general guidance only.

text: The puppy growth tracker is amazing! Love watching my dog's progress.
name: Priyanka Reddy

text: Would be great to have more homemade pet food recipes.
name: Arun Kumar

text: The water tracking feature has helped keep my cat hydrated!
name: Meghna Das

text: The app helped me transition my cat to a new food safely.
name: Rohit Malhotra

text: The barcode scanner doesn't work well in low light.
name: Shalini Iyer

text: My senior dog's digestion has improved thanks to your food recommendations!
name: Amitabh Verma

text: The weight management tools are very helpful for my overweight cat.
name: Sunita Rao

text: Could you add more information about seasonal allergies?

text: The community helped me find a great vet in my new city!

text: The medication tracker is a lifesaver for my diabetic dog.

text: Would love to see more scientific references for the food recommendations.

text: The app helped me discover my dog was lactose intolerant!
